name: That Sneaky Cat
description:
That Sneaky Cat is a 2D stealth game. There have been several fishy thefts and you have to infiltrate the K9 Facility to look for clues as to the mastermind behind the thefts. Your only weapon is to sneak past guards and temporarily blind them with time freezers.

Keyboard/Gamepad Controls

Arrow keys /Analogue Stick - To Move

X / B - To interact/Pick up

Z / Y - Drop time freezers

Was made for #GPJAM but missed the deadline. Only able to make one simple level.
